# File lib/erector/widget.rb, line 655
    def format_sorted(sorted)
      results = ['']
      sorted.each do |key, value|
        if value
          if value.is_a?(Array)
            value = [value].flatten.join(' ')
          end
          results << "#{key}=\"#{value.html_escape}\""
        end
      end
      return results.join(' ')
    end
